com.team1389.control

Class SynchronousPIDController<O extends Value,I extends PIDTunableValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.control.SynchronousPID
      • com.team1389.control.SynchronousPIDController<O,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the value type of the output stream
    I - the value type of the input stream
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MotionProfileController

    public class SynchronousPIDController<O extends Value,I extends PIDTunableValue>
extends SynchronousPID
    This class applies PID control to a set of input/output streams
    Does all computation synchronously (i.e. the calculate() function must be called by the user from his own thread)
    Author:
    amind

      • SynchronousPIDController

        public SynchronousPIDController(double kP,
                                double kI,
                                double kD,
                                RangeIn<I> source,
                                RangeOut<O> output)
        Parameters:
        kP - the proportional gain of the PID controller
        kI - the integral gain of the PID controller
        kD - the derivative gain of the PID controller
        source - the input stream
        output - the output stream

        Parameters:
        constants - a set of gains for the PID controller
        source - the input stream
        output - the output stream

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        updates the PID controller with the value of the input stream, applies the output of the controller to the output stream

      • getSetpointSetter

        public RangeOut<I> getSetpointSetter()
        Returns:
        an output stream that will pass applied values to the PID controller as setpoints

      • getSource

        public RangeIn<I> getSource()
        Returns:
        the input stream

      • getOutput

        public RangeOut<O> getOutput()
        Returns:
        the original output stream

      • getPIDDoCommand

        public Command getPIDDoCommand()
        Returns:
        an Command that updates the PID controller indefinitely

      • getPIDDoCommand

        public Command getPIDDoCommand(double tolerance)
        Parameters:
        tolerance - the tolerance within which to halt the PID updates
        Returns:
        an Command that updates the PID controller until the value of the input stream is within the given tolerance of the setpoint

      • getPIDDoCommand

        public Command getPIDDoCommand(BinaryInput exitCondition)
        Parameters:
        exitCondition - boolean stream that determines when to halt PID updates
        Returns:
        an Command that updates the PID controller until the value of the boolean stream is true

      • setPID

        public void setPID(PIDConstants constants)
        Parameters:
        constants - a set of gains for the PID controller

      • getPID

        public PIDConstants getPID()
        Returns:
        the current gains of the PID controller

      • getPIDTuner

        public CompositeWatchable getPIDTuner(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tuner watchable
        Returns:
        a watchable object that can accept input to adjust the gains of the PID controller
